subject: Attn: To Ruth
body:
Ruth Attn: To Foreign Beneficiary UBA BANK PLC ACCRA - GH.   Sir, Good Afternoon to You. UBA Bank Plc. 
 We acknowledged the receipt of your mail response. 
 
 The Board of Directors, Bank Of Africa (BOA) has ordered our Remittance Unit through our Automated Teller Machine (ATM) Department to issue you a CORPORATE ATM VISA MASTER CARD. 
 
 In respect to the fee amount $695 only required  It's for account opening and ATM Card processing. These should be on your own accounts. is a must that you the beneficiary will cover expenses involved for the transaction of these $3.5 millions US Dollars. 
 
 Kindly send it immediately through western Union/ Ria. 
 
 Receiver Name.Charity - Alornyeku 
Address:54 Lapaz Road, Accra Ghana. Amount: $695 only. 
 
 Your mail response will highly be appreciated. 
 
Thank You; 
 
Yours Sincerely, 
 
Remit. Director UBA Bank Plc. 
Accra - Ghana Breach. 
Tel: +233–535-078-139. 
Code 0000661120

subject: Attn: To Deborah
body:
Attn: To Deborah 
Foreign Beneficiary 
UBA BANK PLC 
ACCRA - GH. 
 
 
UBA Bank Plc. 
Good Afternoon To You. 
Madam, 
We acknowledge the receipt of your email response? 
The Board of Directors, Bank Of Africa (BOA) has ordered our Remittance Unit through our Automated Teller Machine (ATM) Department to issue you a CORPORATE ATM VISA MASTER CARD. 
 
Where your payment will be uploaded. And will allow you to withdraw your fund in a maximum amount of US$2,000/US$4,000 per day in any visa ATM Machine worldwide without any query from any authority. 
You are hereby required to download the attach file which is our bank account application FORM fill it and forward it back to us with a scan copy of your passport ID. Honestly, an Atm Card is the best option to receive your funds payment smoothly without any problems. Based on your question about the fee, it's a fixed fee required. 
The account opening fee/Atm Card processing is just £685 kindly send it through western union or world remit/Ria with the below name information.by next week Tuesday your Atm Visa Master Card will be out loaded with the funds FUND $3.5 M.For delivery to your home address. 
1. Full Names:........ 
2. Mobile No:......... 
3. Occupations:........ 
4. Home Address:...... 
Receiver's Name: CHARITY - ALORNYEKU 
Address: Plot 54 Lapaz Road, Accra - Ghana. 
Fee Amount: £685 
Thanks For your Cooperation. 
Your mail response will highly be appreciated. 
 
Yours Sincerely, 
 
Remit. Director UBA Bank Plc. 
Accra - Ghana Breach. 
Tel: +233–535-078-139. 
Code 000066112024 
Transit Code 2024

subject: Re: Attn: To Deborah
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. It's quite interesting to hear about this CORPORATE ATM VISA MASTER CARD. I must say, the idea of being able to withdraw funds from any visa ATM Machine worldwide is very appealing.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed. Could you please explain more about how this card works? And why is there a need for an account opening fee? 

Also, could you provide more information about CHARITY ALORNYEKU? Is she a representative of UBA Bank Plc?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: Attn: To Deborah
body:
Attn: To Deborah 
Foreign Beneficiary 
UBA BANK PLC 
ACCRA - GH. 
 
 
UBA Bank Plc. 
Good Afternoon To You. 
Madam, 
We acknowledge the receipt of your email response? 
Thanks for your question...? 
1.This Atm Card is just like your country Credit Card/Debit card or Visa Master card.2. This is the best means to access funds and lower cost.....And very easy also.3 The additional charge is the DHL posting fee of the Atm to your home address. 
In respect of Ms. CHARITY ALORNYEKU? She's a representative of UBA Bank Plc, And 1 of the bank worker massager's. 
Thanks For your Cooperation. 
Your mail response will highly be appreciated. 
 
Yours Sincerely, 
 
Remit. Director UBA Bank Plc. 
Accra - Ghana Breach. 
Tel: +233–535-078-139. 
Code 000066112024 
Transit Code 2024

subject: Re: Attn: To Deborah
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. I'm quite intrigued by the information you've shared about the ATM card. It sounds like a convenient way to access funds.

Could you please provide more details about how this ATM card works? Is it similar to my regular debit or credit card? And how does the DHL posting fee work?

Also, could you tell me more about Ms. Charity Alornyeku's role at UBA Bank Plc? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: Attn: To Deborah
body:
Hello,

Good afternoon! I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your prompt response and the information provided.

I'm a bit confused about some details though. Could you please clarify what exactly are the details required by the bank? Also, could you explain more about the Transit Code?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

body:

Could you please explain in detail what details are required by the bank? Also, could you clarify what the transit code is used for?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Deborah
